issue.title: [CF 617] AceConfigDialog-3.0.lua line 804: attempt to index field 'rootframe' (a nil value)
issue.body:
Error occured in: Global
Count: 1
Message: ...nfig-3.0\AceConfigDialog-3.0\AceConfigDialog-3.0.lua line 804:
   attempt to index field 'rootframe' (a nil value)
Debug:
   [string "*:OnLoad"]:6:
      [string "*:OnLoad"]:1
   (tail call): ?
   ...nfig-3.0\AceConfigDialog-3.0\AceConfigDialog-3.0.lua:804:
      ...nfig-3.0\AceConfigDialog-3.0\AceConfigDialog-3.0.lua:614
   (tail call): ?
   [C]: ?
   [string "safecall Dispatcher[4]"]:9:
      [string "safecall Dispatcher[4]"]:5
   (tail call): ?
   ...ce\AddOns\GatherMate2\Libs\AceGUI-3.0\AceGUI-3.0.lua:314: Fire()
   ...ate2\Libs\AceGUI-3.0\widgets\AceGUIWidget-Button.lua:28:
      ...ate2\Libs\AceGUI-3.0\widgets\AceGUIWidget-Button.lua:25

Using r610, this error appeared after I moved all the icons from the group I exported for the mushroom ticket back to where they belonged and then deleted the group.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #617 | Raw

comments.body:
Damn, I thought I figured out a way to put the code that was causing this back in.

I guess not.

Well, actually, it looks like something else is happening. I just don't know what, so I will just change the delay on the problem function call from 0.1 seconds to 0.5 seconds. Hopefully that will be enough to fix it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I'm going to assume this one is fixed now, but it if happens again then just reply to this ticket and tell me it happened again.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I deleted a few more groups without any significant event. Then I decided to use the ctrl modifier instead of clicking the confirmation box and got this error.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer

Tried something else in r617. Knowing the nature of this error (happen for no apparent reason and be impossible to reproduce), it probably didn't fix it, but it was worth a shot I suppose.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
